Text.Page: You hunted hyenas at Filton's ranch.

Hi, ! I was hoping you'd come by.

Those hyenas are back. Can I ask you to drive them off again? "Yes."

You are so awesome, . Are you sure you don't want to settle down and become a rancher?

Well, all right. Here, take this fresh milk as a reward. And feel free to come back any time! "It was no trouble!"
